author: ajsutton
content:
My impression is that there are a very significant number of nodes which don’t accept inbound connections meaning the ones that do tend to be quite heavily in demand and you get these too many peers rejections a lot. 
The flip side is that if you ensure your ports are open so inbound connections work I’ve found you wind up getting all the peers you can handle. Takes a bit for discovery to make your node known enough but definitely much better connectivity.
